{{cpp/regex/sub_match/title | sub_match}}
{{cpp/regex/sub_match/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
constexpr sub_match();
}}

Default constructs a {{lc|std::sub_match}}. The {{rlpt|/#Data members|matched}} member is set to {{c|false}} and the inherited members {{rlpt|/#Data members|first}} and {{rlpt|/#Data members|second}} are value-initialized.

This is the only publicly accessible and defined constructor.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;

int main()
{
    std::sub_match&lt;const char*&gt; s;
    assert(!s.matched);
}
}}
